name: R&V
overview: R&V theory of cooperation from the network’s first innovation economics. Total combined net that the world of resources everywhere, every social system, each market and products have specific groups of people, carrier, or channel resources; these specific groups of people, carrier, or channel, is the reality of market-oriented economic resources (real resource), but in the implication behind the great with other social systems, markets and products to share the potential energy, with huge potential business opportunities, that of virtual resources (virtual resource); all kinds of resources can be held between integration through sharing of resources, a variety of effective and innovative economic model, the establishment of non-competitive strategic alliances, the activation energy release potential resources, and create new value and achieve win-win and win. R & V theory derived from innovative R & V business model. Non-competitive on the R & V Strategic Alliance R&V and non-competitive strategic alliances for short R & V Union. This is a new business model. Tezhi R & V Theory of resources and virtual resources, the reality of the strategic alliance business model. And the existing competitive strategic alliance different, R & V Lian Meng is a non-competitive as the forming of the alliance to consider is how to make one of the resources of Amending the share, and in sharing basis, so that all enjoy the sharing of resources Yongyoushuangfang Dai to the additional revenue, maximize the effectiveness of resources. R & V and non-competitive strategic alliances to create a new strategic alliances, resource integration approach, business cooperation model is based on the integration of real resources and virtual resources, new business models.

funding_rounds.source_description: R&V raised US$20 million from Softbank China and CDH Investment in a second round of funding
